blogs.title: Public Blog
blogs.body: Hey Guys. So I made this simple blog app. Its open for anyone who has clicked this link. Well, be free to post anything. Dont take it too seriously. Not a big deal, huh!. And well, I wouldnt know who posted it coz Ive set the option value of input in the form to anonymous.
blogs.author: Allan
